headline: Election 2022: Perry Joint Fire District seeks additional levy
author: Bill DeBus
sentences: Fire district leaders said money from the levy is needed to maintain the current level of services provided to residents.
Perry Joint Fire District is asking voters to approve a 3-mill, five-year additional levy on the May 3 primary ballot.
The levy would raise $1,177,640 per year and cost taxpayers $105 annually per $100,000 in property tax valuation.
